name: FOLLOW_UP_ACTIONS
description: This table contains information regarding follow-up actions. Each row in this table indicates a follow-up action that was taken for a particular LFT record ID.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column displays follow-up actions such as Mail, Telephone or MyChart message.
